analysis.description:
PreSale.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol#566-567) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol#567)

PreSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol#585-591) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol)

Reentrancy in PreSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol#585-591):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/16/0xb21b519028122033a5be2d32f4f8f66616e5b08c.sol#10-12) should be declared external
